column2: "Isn't it cheating to cooperate? Shouldn't you fight fair and square? ...well, ARKS is like a mob."
"I still managed to deal with them somehow. But your average members would be lucky to make it out of there alive, you know?"
"We've really got to see these guys in action. And we already know they're swarmers, so you'll be prepared. I'm sure you'll be up to it."
"I'm counting on you. I'll be checking the whole thing out on the monitor, and with a big ol' smile on my face! Go get 'em!"
